title: bandanEne ranga
sahitya:
bandanEne ranga bandanEne


anupallavi

  enna tande bAlakrSNa navanIta cOra


caraNam 1    ghilu ghilu ghiluremba ponnanduge gejje hoLe hoLeyuva pAdavanUruta 
nalinlidADUva ungura araLele thaLa thaLa thaLa hoLeyuta shrI krSNa
    caraNam 2    kiNI kiNi kiNirembakarada kankaNa baLe jhaNa jhaNa jhaNaremba naDuvina gaNTe
thaNa thaNa thaNaremba  pAdada toDavina miNi miNi kuNidADuta shrI krSNa
    caraNam 3    hiDi hiDi hiDiyendu purandara vittalana duDu duDu duDu duDane Oduta 
naDe naDe naDeyendu mellana piDiyalu piDi piDi piDi dammayya ennuta
